widgets.title: Supported Question Widgets
widgets.description: Hoppy supports a variety of interactive widgets for creating engaging educational questions. Explore the different visualization types available for quiz content.

analogClock.title: Analog Clock
analogClock.description: Interactive analog clock display with hour and minute hands. Optional second hand for precise time questions.

digitalClock.title: Digital Clock
digitalClock.description: 7-segment digital clock display supporting both 12-hour (AM/PM) and 24-hour formats.

barChart.title: Bar Chart
barChart.description: Vertical bar chart with configurable axes, labels, and values. Perfect for data interpretation questions.

stackedBarChart.title: Stacked Bar Chart
stackedBarChart.description: Vertical stacked bar chart with multiple data series. Supports up to 4 series with automatic color assignment and legend.

brokenLineGraph.title: Broken Line Graph
brokenLineGraph.description: Line chart where data points are connected by straight line segments. Supports multiple series with different colors for trend comparison.

boxWhisker.title: Box Whisker Plot
boxWhisker.description: Statistical box-and-whisker plot showing five-number summary: smallest, Q1, median, Q3, and largest values.

equationGraph.title: Equation Graph
equationGraph.description: Mathematical function plotter supporting LaTeX notation. Display single or multiple equations with customizable colors and axes.

shape3d.title: 3D Shapes
shape3d.description: Interactive 3D geometric shapes with perspective projection. Supports various polyhedra including tetrahedra, cubes, prisms, pyramids, and octahedra with labeled vertices and automatic hidden-edge detection.

circuit.title: Electric Circuit
circuit.description: Interactive electric circuit diagrams with batteries, resistors, bulbs, switches, ammeters, voltmeters, and wire connections. Supports series and parallel circuits with automatic junction detection.
circuit.featureNodes: Grid-based node positioning for flexible circuit layouts
circuit.featurePolarity: Polarity markers for batteries and switches
circuit.featureJunctions: Automatic junction dots where more than 2 wires connect

chemicalEquation.title: Chemical Equation
chemicalEquation.description: Render chemical equations with proper subscripts, superscripts, and reaction arrows. Perfect for chemistry questions involving reactions, balancing equations, and stoichiometry.
chemicalEquation.featureStates: State symbols for matter phases (s, l, g, aq)

svg.title: SVG Graphics
svg.description: Custom SVG drawings with full attribute support

tables.title: Tables
tables.description: HTML tables with colspan, rowspan, and LaTeX content

geometry.title: 3D Geometry
geometry.description: Interactive 3D shapes with perspective projection and labeled vertices

qna.title: Frequently Asked Questions
qna.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Hoppy

q1.question: What is Hoppy?
q1.answer: Hoppy is an educational app designed to make learning fun and engaging for children. With our mascot, Hoppy the bunny, kids embark on exciting learning adventures through interactive activities, games, and challenges. The app covers various subjects including mathematics, science, and more, using innovative visualization tools to make complex concepts easy to understand.

q2.question: Who is Hoppy designed for?
q2.answer: Hoppy is specifically designed for curious young minds, typically children in primary and secondary education. The app adapts to different learning levels and provides age-appropriate content that keeps kids engaged while learning at their own pace.

q3.question: What subjects and topics does Hoppy cover?
q3.answer: Hoppy covers a wide range of subjects, primarily HK curriculum subjects, including Mathematics (time-telling, data interpretation, geometry, algebra, statistics), Science (physics circuits, chemistry equations), and more. The app features interactive widgets like analog and digital clocks, various charts and graphs, 3D geometric shapes, electric circuits, chemical equations, and mathematical function plotters.

q5.question: Is Hoppy free to use?
q5.answer: You can download Hoppy for free from the App Store or Google Play. The app offers various content and features. For detailed pricing information, please visit our download page or contact us at hi@hoppy.day.

q6.question: What devices and platforms support Hoppy?
q6.answer: Hoppy is available on both iOS and Android platforms. You can download it from the App Store for iPhone and iPad, or from Google Play for Android devices. The app is optimized for both smartphones and tablets to provide the best learning experience.

q7.question: Where is Hoppy available?
q7.answer: Hoppy is currently available in Hong Kong with full access and local support. We're actively working to expand to more regions around the world. If you'd like to be notified when Hoppy becomes available in your region, please contact us at hi@hoppy.day.

q8.question: How can I track my child's learning progress?
q8.answer: Hoppy includes built-in progress tracking features that help you monitor your child's learning journey. You can watch your child grow, celebrate their achievements, and see which areas they excel in. The app provides insights into their learning patterns and helps identify areas where they might need additional support.

q10.question: How do I get support or report an issue?
q10.answer: We're here to help! If you have any questions, need assistance, or want to report an issue, please contact our support team at hi@hoppy.day. We typically respond within 24-48 hours and are committed to providing the best experience for your family.

q11.question: Can multiple children use one Hoppy account?
q11.answer: Yes! Hoppy supports multiple user profiles, allowing each child in your family to have their own personalized learning experience with individual progress tracking. This ensures that each child can learn at their own pace and have their achievements tracked separately.

q12.question: What makes Hoppy different from other educational apps?
q12.answer: Hoppy stands out with its unique combination of engaging mascot-led learning, innovative interactive widgets, and comprehensive subject coverage. Our focus on making learning addictive (in a good way!) through fun, colorful design and creative play sets us apart. We use professional visualization tools like LaTeX math rendering, interactive 3D geometry, and real-time circuit simulations that make complex concepts accessible and exciting for young learners.
